data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Livio Marinelli signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
In the minute 1, Sassuolo's Manuel Locatelli gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Cagliari defender.
Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
Gian Marco Ferrari (Sassuolo) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 2, Goal kick for Cagliari at Mapei Stadium.
In Reggio Emilia Sassuolo drive forward through Lukas Haraslin. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Livio Marinelli.
In the minute 4, Domenico Berardi of Sassuolo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Livio Marinelli awards Cagliari a goal kick.
Free kick Sassuolo.
In the minute 5, Throw-in Cagliari.
Ball safe as Sassuolo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick in a good position for Sassuolo!
In the minute 7, Paolo Farago (Cagliari) gets a yellow card.
Sassuolo drive upfield and Lukas Haraslin gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Cagliari defender.
Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Livio Marinelli.
In the minute 9, Sassuolo's Rogerio gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Reggio Emilia.
Sassuolo to take a throw-in in Cagliari territory.
In the minute 10, Sassuolo's Francesco Caputo breaks free at Mapei Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Cagliari awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sassuolo's Francesco Caputo gets in a shot on goal at Mapei Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Cagliari in their own half.
Manuel Locatelli of Sassuolo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In Reggio Emilia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 15, Ball goes out of play for a Sassuolo goal kick.
Free kick for Sassuolo in the half of Cagliari.
At Mapei Stadium, Nahitan Nandez has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 17, Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jeremy Toljan (Sassuolo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
In the minute 19, Throw-in high up the field for Cagliari in Reggio Emilia.
Livio Marinelli signals a throw-in for Sassuolo, close to Cagliari's area.
Cagliari have a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Livio Marinelli signals a free kick to Cagliari.
Babis Lykogiannis gets his shot on target but fails to score for Cagliari.
Livio Marinelli awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 24, Corner awarded to Cagliari.
Goal kick for Sassuolo at Mapei Stadium.
Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
In the minute 29, Domenico Berardi for Sassuolo drives towards goal at Mapei Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Vlad Chiriches (Sassuolo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Sassuolo are pushing forward but Lukas Haraslin's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 31, Cagliari have a goal kick.
In Reggio Emilia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Sassuolo in the half of Cagliari.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Sassuolo close to the penalty box.
Livio Marinelli signals a free kick to Sassuolo.
Throw-in for Cagliari at Mapei Stadium.
In the minute 36, It's a goal kick for the away team in Reggio Emilia.
Cagliari drives forward and Joao Pedro gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick Sassuolo.
In the minute 38, Sassuolo's Domenico Berardi misses with an attempt on goal.
Livio Marinelli awards Cagliari a goal kick.
Free kick for Sassuolo in the half of Cagliari.
In the minute 39, Sassuolo push forward at Mapei Stadium and Manuel Locatelli gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Cagliari defence.
Domenico Berardi is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Sassuoloâ€™s Domenico Berardi is on his feet again at Mapei Stadium.
In the minute 41, Free kick Cagliari.
Livio Marinelli signals a free kick to Sassuolo.
Corner awarded to Cagliari.
In the minute 43, Giovanni Simeone's header is off-target for Cagliari.
Ball goes out of play for a Sassuolo goal kick.
Cagliari needs to be cautious. Sassuolo have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 45, Lukas Haraslin (Sassuolo) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Cagliari defenders.
Livio Marinelli signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Cagliari is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Reggio Emilia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Sassuolo are coming forward and Rogerio gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Livio Marinelli awards Cagliari a goal kick.
Nahitan Nandez for Cagliari gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the home team in Reggio Emilia.
Throw-in for Cagliari in the half of Sassuolo.
Giovanni Simeone (Cagliari) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 45, Sassuolo have a goal kick.
The first-half is over.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Francesco Caputo of Sassuolo is pulled up for offside.
Livio Marinelli awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 46, Eusebio Di Francesco (Cagliari) is making a first substitution, with Fabio Pisacane replacing Ragnar Klavan.
In the minute 48, Cagliari have been awarded a corner by Livio Marinelli.
Sassuolo's Francesco Caputo is on target but unsuccessful.
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 49, Throw-in Cagliari.
Cagliari pushes forward through Nahitan Nandez, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick Sassuolo.
In the minute 50, Cagliari's Marko Rog has been booked in Reggio Emilia.
Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
Sassuolo are coming forward and Rogerio gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 52, Ball goes out of play for a Cagliari goal kick.
Throw-in for Sassuolo in their own half.
Livio Marinelli signals a Cagliari throw-in in Sassuolo's half.
In the minute 56, Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Livio Marinelli.
In Reggio Emilia Sassuolo attack through Rogerio. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Cagliari at Mapei Stadium.
In the minute 56, Can Sassuolo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cagliari's half?
Sassuolo's Pedro Obiang is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
In the minute 59, Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vlad Chiriches (Sassuolo) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Cagliari at Mapei Stadium.
In the minute 61, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Rogerio.
Gabriele Zappa is replacing Fabrizio Caligara for the away team.
Giorgos Kyriakopoulos (Sassuolo) has replaced the possibly injured Rogerio.
In the minute 63, Roberto De Zerbi is making the team's second substitution at Mapei Stadium with Mehdi Bourabia replacing Pedro Obiang.
Gregoire Defrel is replacing Lukas Haraslin for Sassuolo at Mapei Stadium.
Sassuolo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 64, Livio Marinelli signals a free kick to Sassuolo.
In Reggio Emilia, Francesco Caputo of Sassuolo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Sassuolo's Francesco Caputo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 65, Cagliari have a goal kick.
Can Cagliari get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sassuolo's half?
Ball safe as Sassuolo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 69, Important block from the Cagliari defence as Domenico Berardi fires in a strike for Sassuolo.
Francesco Caputo for Sassuolo is whistled offside.
Livio Marinelli awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 71, Can Cagliari capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sassuolo's half?
Domenico Berardi for Sassuolo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Cagliari at Mapei Stadium.
In the minute 75, It's a goal kick for the away team in Reggio Emilia.
The home team have replaced Jeremy Toljan with Mert Muldur. This is the fourth substitution made today by Roberto De Zerbi.
The away team replace Marko Rog with Riccardo Sottil.
In the minute 76, Cagliari make their fourth substitution with Christian Oliva replacing Razvan Marin.
Ball goes out of play for a Cagliari goal kick.
Goal! A Giovanni Simeone header gives Cagliari a 0-1 lead in Reggio Emilia.
In the minute 77, Great play from Joao Pedro to set up the goal.
Francesco Caputo of Sassuolo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in Sassuolo.
In the minute 81, In Reggio Emilia Cagliari attack through Paolo Farago. The finish is off target, however.
Livio Marinelli awards Sassuolo a goal kick.
Cagliari drive forward but Giovanni Simeone is judged offside.
In the minute 82, Cagliari's Riccardo Sottil is whistled for offside at Mapei Stadium.
Mert Muldur (Sassuolo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Sassuolo have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 84, Goal kick for Cagliari at Mapei Stadium.
Sassuolo's Gregoire Defrel gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Cagliari defender.
Cagliari needs to be cautious. Sassuolo have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 86, In Reggio Emilia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Mehdi Bourabia levels the score at 1-1.
Alessandro Tripaldelli is on a sub for Joao Pedro for Cagliari.
In the minute 89, Livio Marinelli signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
Throw-in for Cagliari at Mapei Stadium.
Ball goes out of play for a Cagliari goal kick.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Domenico Berardi (Sassuolo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Livio Marinelli signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Livio Marinelli.
Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
Sassuolo's Manuel Locatelli breaks free at Mapei Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Livio Marinelli awards Cagliari a goal kick.
Livio Marinelli blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
The home team have replaced Filip Djuricic with Kaan Ayhan. This is the fifth substitution made today by Roberto De Zerbi.
